name: The Samnites
startIntroPart1: I don't think anyone actually downloads these mods but did you know the Samnite tribes outlawed slavery? That's some pretty fucking progressive morals for an Iron Age civilization. They were known as the strongest individual fighters in the Italian peninsula, and were a regional power that could take on the Greeks, despite their federation being decentralized into four basically independent cantons during times of peace. Each one followed a different sacred creature, as the Samnite religion was distinct from that of other Italic peoples with a strong focus on animals. They're genuinely pretty interesting and underrepresented, I'd check them out.

declaringWar: Your wicked transgressions towards our Oscan brethren ends today! Samnite Federation, M-M-M-Morph Up!
attacked: The Divine Winds blow in my favor little man. You will not be walking away from this one.
defeated: Oh, Gods forgive me. All is lost...
introduction: We are the free peoples of the Samnite Federation. Respect our peoples, our land, and it's spirits, and we'll get along fine.
neutralHello: The Samnite federation greets you, emissary.
hateHello: If you call us Sabines I will shit in your villa.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace:
This war has cost us our peoples too much. 
The next decade will be one 
of friendship, assuredly.
uniques: Provides a [Tout√≠ks Kombennio] in your first [5] cities for free

uniqueText:
+1 [Faith] for all land animal resources. 
The first five Samnite cities become cantons, and can each choose a unique bonus and corresponding promotion for built Melee units dependant on the animal resources within city borders. 
Can purchase settlers with [Faith]

name: Etruscans
declaringWar: Unfortunately, your time has come; it is foretold in the stars.
attacked:
Hm. Another upstart think they're the ones to finally supercede the venerable Etruscans, after a millennia. 
Unsuprising.
defeated:
When I'm out there all alone 
And feeling far from home 
I'm fading into blue 
And there's nothing I can do Then out on the sky like a flash 
Sending me high, high, high 
You rescue me 
You saved me from a certain tragedy 
I get messages from the stars 
When you're making love to me 
I get messages from the stars 
You must be from another galaxy

uniqueText:
Non-Capital cities suffer -15% [Gold] and [Production] plus an extra -15% [Production] of military land units, 
but get a weaker version of the palace and -40% unhappiness and increase in policy [Culture] cost. 
 Great merchants are earned +40% faster and allied city state yield +40% of their [Gold] output. 
+1 [Gold] and +1 [Culture] from [Marble].
uniques: [+3 Gold, +2 Culture, +1 Production, +1 Science, +1 Food] [in all cities]
Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [-40]% less than normal
[-3 Gold, -2 Culture, -1 Production, -1 Science, -1 Food] [in capital]
Allied City-States provide [Gold] equal to [40]% of what they produce for themselves
[-15]% Production when constructing [{Military} {Land}] units [in all cities]
